attributes.action: repeal the decision made by the Welsh assembly to give free prescriptions to all
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Repeal the decision made by the Welsh assembly to give free prescriptions to all Welsh residents, why should a border lead to discrimination for those with illnesses that require constant medication

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
